title: Towards healthy cities: Modeling restorative potential of urban environments by coupling LiDAR-derived 3D metrics with panorama-based online survey

Source: Environmental Impact Assessment Review, Volume 106

Author(s): Xudong Zhang, Jinda Qi, Ervine Shengwei Lin, Puay Yok Tan, Roger Ho, Angelia Sia, Xiao Ping Song, Radha Waykool, Agnieszka Olszewska-Guizzo
